tool.name: NCBI EFetch
tool.command: @ECONTACT@ efetch #if str( $db.db ) == "": #if str( $db.db_manual ): -db "${db.db_manual}" #end if #if str( $db.format ): -format "${db.format}" #end if #if str( $db.mode ): -mode "${db.mode}" #end if #else: #if str( $db.db ): -db "${db.db}" #end if #if str( $db.format.format ): -format "${db.format.format}" #end if #if str( $db.format.mode ): -mode "${db.format.mode}" #end if #end if #if str( $ranges.seq_start ): -seq_start "${ranges.seq_start}" #end if #if str( $ranges.seq_stop ): -seq_stop "${ranges.seq_stop}" #end if #if str( $ranges.strand ): -strand "${ranges.strand}" #end if #if str( $ranges.complexity ): -complexity "${ranges.complexity}" #end if #if str( $ranges.chr_start ): -chr_start "${ranges.chr_start}" #end if #if str( $ranges.chr_stop ): -chr_stop "${ranges.chr_stop}" #end if #if str( $query.source ) == "id": -id "${query.id}" #else: < '$query.input_file' #end if > '${output_result}'
